Name: Sensor SSH Cowrie
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The Sensor SSH Cowrie solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to deploy a Azure VM for as a HoneyPot for private internal detection tripwire capabilitties or deploy publicly on the internet for threat intellegence gathering.

  **Underlying Technologies used:** 

 This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

  a. [Cowrie](https://cowrie.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
